summary: Sven, the average Swedish guy, bored with his life, decides to go to Thailand to write a novel and "get away from the rat race". He meets a range of peculiar characters and learns a few things about love, friendship and himself.
cast: Peter Magnusson|Susanne Thorson|Jenny Skavlan|David Hellenius|Grynet Molvig|Alexandra Rapaport|Frida Hallgren|Frida Westerdahl|Mårten Klingberg|Yngve Dahlberg|Matias Varela|Henrik Norlén|Hanna Alström|Johan Hallström|Eric Rydman|Ulrika Ellemark|Claes Månsson|Ella Fogelström|Mari-Anne Jakobsson|Warakorn Jitpat|Lisbeth Johansson|Susan Karlsson|Bosse Körling|Anna Lindmarker|Adam Lundgren|Bo Lyckman|Lediana Miftari|Fredrik Skavlan|Lynn Strahed|Katrin Sundberg|Donna Taylor|Lisa von Garrelts|Ping Mon H. title: En gång i Phuket
